original_solution_mapping.L1: Traveling at 50 yards per minute, Biff can travel 500 yards in 500/50=<<500/50=10>>10 minutes.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In 10 minutes, traveling at 51 yards per minute, Kenneth can travel 10*51=<<10*51=510>>510 yards.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Thus, Kenneth will be 510-500=<<510-500=10>>10 yards past the finish line when Biff crosses the finish line.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4732.
    Returns: the number of yards Kenneth will be past the finish line.
    """
    # L1
    race_distance = 500 # a 500-yard rowboat race
    biff_speed = 50 # Biff rows at a speed of 50 yards per minute
    time_biff_finishes = race_distance / biff_speed

    # L2
    kenneth_speed = 51 # Kenneth rows at a speed of 51 yards per minute
    distance_kenneth_travels = time_biff_finishes * kenneth_speed

    # L3
    yards_past_finish_line = distance_kenneth_travels - race_distance

    # FA
    answer = yards_past_finish_line
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Traveling at {biff_speed} yards per minute, Biff can travel {race_distance} yards in {race_distance}/{biff_speed}=<<{race_distance}/{biff_speed}={time_biff_finishes}>>{time_biff_finishes} minutes.

In {time_biff_finishes} minutes, traveling at {kenneth_speed} yards per minute, Kenneth can travel {time_biff_finishes}*{kenneth_speed}=<<{time_biff_finishes}*{kenneth_speed}={distance_kenneth_travels}>>{distance_kenneth_travels} yards.

Thus, Kenneth will be {distance_kenneth_travels}-{race_distance}=<<{distance_kenneth_travels}-{race_distance}={yards_past_finish_line}>>{yards_past_finish_line} yards past the finish line when Biff crosses the finish line.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Traveling at 50 yards per minute, Biff can travel 500 yards in 500/50=<<500/50=450>>450 minutes.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: In 450 minutes, traveling at 51 yards per minute, Kenneth can travel 450*51=<<450*51=22950>>22950 yards.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Thus, Kenneth will be 22950-500=<<22950-500=22450>>22450 yards past the finish line when Biff crosses the finish line.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.
